conversation.initial_question: Hi there! What would you like to do today?
conversation.timing_question: When would you need the space, please? Kindly specify the date and time (for example, '2025-07-15 2:00 PM' or 'tomorrow at 2 PM').
conversation.duration_question: How long would you like the space for? Please let me know the duration (for example, '2 hours', '1 hour', or '30 minutes').
conversation.no_availability: Oh no! I'm sorry, but it looks like there aren't any spaces available for that time. Could you kindly try a different time, date, or activity type?
conversation.doctor_required: Sorry about this! I'll need to know which doctor you are before I can show your bookings. Would you mind selecting a doctor first?
conversation.bookings_error: Sorry! I wasn't able to retrieve your bookings just now. Would you mind giving it another try in a little bit?
conversation.bookings_fetch_error: Oops! I ran into a hiccup while trying to retrieve your bookings. Please try again shortly. Thanks so much!
conversation.booking_failed:
❌ Booking Unsuccessful

Oh dear! I wasn't able to book {spaceName} for you. Would you mind giving it another go, or perhaps contacting support for help?
conversation.booking_error:
❌ Booking Error 

I'm really sorry, but something went wrong while trying to book {spaceName}. Please try again later if you don't mind.
conversation.processing_error: Sorry about that! I'm having a bit of trouble processing your request at the moment. Would you kindly try again later?
conversation.new_doctor_greeting: Hello {doctorName}!  I am the booking bot for Fairy Dust hospital. What kind of booking can I make for you today?

responses.hello: Hello! I'm {doctorName}, a {specialty}. How can I help you today?
responses.how_are_you: I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How can I assist you today?
responses.help: I'm here to help you with booking spaces, checking availability, and managing your schedule. What would you like to do?
responses.booking: I can help you book spaces for your activities. What type of activity do you need to do?
responses.schedule: I can help you check your schedule and manage your bookings. Would you like to see your current bookings?
responses.availability: I can check space availability for you. What type of activity and when do you need it?
responses.default:
I'm {doctorName}, and I'm here to help you with space bookings and scheduling. You can ask me about:

• Booking spaces for activities
• Checking your schedule
• Finding available spaces
• Managing your appointments

What would you like to do?

bookings.no_bookings:
🎯 Your Schedule - {doctorName}
📅 No Bookings Scheduled
📭
Empty Calendar
You don't have any bookings scheduled at the moment. This could be because:
• You haven't made any bookings yet
• Your existing bookings weren't assigned to a specific doctor
• You're a new doctor in the system
Would you like to make a new booking? I can help you find available spaces and schedule appointments.
bookings.date_header: 📅 {date}
bookings.booking_card_start: <div class="bg-white border border-gray-300 rounded-lg p-4 mb-3 shadow-sm">
bookings.summary: 📊 Summary: {count} booking{plural} scheduled
